conduits.name: Fel Celerity
conduits.description: Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by 45 sec.

conduits.name: Resolute Barrier
conduits.description: Attacks received that deal at least 5% of your health decrease Unending Resolve's cooldown by 10 seconds. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.

conduits.name: Accrued Vitality
conduits.description: Drain Life heals for 0% of the amount drained over 10 sec.

conduits.name: Shade of Terror
conduits.description: Damage required to break your Fear effects is increased by 0%.

conduits.name: Demonic Momentum
conduits.description: Demonic Circle increases movement speed by 0% for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Corrupting Leer
conduits.description: Agony and Unstable Affliction damage has a 3% chance to reduce the cooldown of Summon Darkglare by 5 sec.

conduits.name: Rolling Agony
conduits.description: Increases the duration of Agony by 4 sec.

conduits.name: Focused Malignancy
conduits.description: Malefic Rapture deals 30% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.

conduits.name: Cold Embrace
conduits.description: Increases the effectiveness of Shadow Embrace by 33%.

conduits.name: Borne of Blood
conduits.description: Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to generate a charge of Demonic Core.

conduits.name: Carnivorous Stalkers
conduits.description: Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a 10% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.

conduits.name: Tyrant's Soul
conduits.description: After your Demonic Tyrant expires, gain a Demonic Core and 10% increased damage from your demons for 15 sec.

conduits.name: Fel Commando
conduits.description: Your Felguard deals 10% more damage and takes 10% less damage.

conduits.name: Duplicitous Havoc
conduits.description: Havoc transfers 10% more damage.

conduits.name: Ashen Remains
conduits.description: Chaos Bolt and Incinerate damage on targets with Immolate increased by 10%.

conduits.name: Combusting Engine
conduits.description: Conflagrate increases your remaining Immolate damage by 15% until Immolate expires or is refreshed.

conduits.name: Infernal Brand
conduits.description: Your Infernal's melee attacks cause its target to take 15% increased damage from its Immolation, stacking up to 15 times.

conduits.name: Soul Tithe
conduits.description:
When a target dies under the effect of Scouring Tithe, gain 10% increased damage from your 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Malefic Rapture</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>demons</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Chaos Bolt</dynamic>

 for 10 sec.

conduits.name: Prolonged Decimation
conduits.description:
<spec>Destruction (Level 10)</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerate</dynamic>

<spec>Affliction</spec><spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Shadow Bolt</dynamic>

 has a 20% chance to not consume a charge of Decimating Bolt.

conduits.name: Catastrophic Origin
conduits.description: Impending Catastrophe's damage over time and the inflicted Curse last 50% longer against your primary target.

conduits.name: Exhumed Soul
conduits.description: Soul Rot damage and radius increased by 20%, but costs 7% more health.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 15% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities, each once per day.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 15% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Scouring Tithe
covenants.description: Deal (100% of Spell power) Arcane damage instantly, and (144% of Spell power) over 18 sec. If the enemy dies while affected by Scouring Tithe, you generate 5 Soul Shard. If they survive, Scouring Tithe's cooldown is refreshed.

covenants.name: Soul Rot
covenants.description:
Wither away all life force of your current target and up to 3 additional targets nearby, causing them to suffer (100% of Spell power) Nature damage over 8 sec.

For the next 8 sec, casting Drain Life will cause you to also Drain Life from any enemy affected by your Soul Rot, and Drain Life will not consume any mana.

Consumes 20% of maximum health when cast.

covenants.name: Decimating Bolt
covenants.description:
Hurl bolts of decimating magic at your target, dealing [4 * (50% of Spell power)] Shadow damage and increasing the damage of your next 3 

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerates</dynamic>

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Souls</dynamic>

Shadow Bolts by 200%.

Decimating Bolt's damage, and the bonus to 

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerate</dynamic>

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Soul</dynamic>

Shadow Bolt both increase as your target's health decreases.

covenants.name: Impending Catastrophe
covenants.description: Call forth a cloud of chaotic anima that travels to the target enemy, dealing (100% of Spell power) Shadow damage to enemies in its path. When the anima reaches the target it explodes, inflicting either Curse of Weakness or Curse of Tongues, and dealing (261% of Spell power) Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies.

legendaries.name: Wilfred's Sigil of Superior Summoning
legendaries.description:
Every Soul Shard you spend reduces the cooldown of 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Darkglare</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Demonic Tyrant</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Summon Infernal</dynamic>

 by 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>1.0</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>0.3</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>2.0</dynamic>

 sec.

legendaries.name: Claw of Endereth
legendaries.description: Drain Life now deals damage and restores health 50% faster.

legendaries.name: Mark of Borrowed Power
legendaries.description:
<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Malefic Rapture</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Call Dreadstalkers</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Chaos Bolt</dynamic>

 has a 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>10</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>25</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>5</dynamic>

% chance to refund all Soul Shards spent.

legendaries.name: Pillars of the Dark Portal
legendaries.description: Demonic Gateway is now instant cast, and your first use of the gateway does not trigger its cooldown.

legendaries.name: Perpetual Agony of Azj'Aqir
legendaries.description: Agony has a 20% increased chance to generate a Soul Shard.

legendaries.name: Sacrolash's Dark Strike
legendaries.description: Corruption damage is increased by 15%, and any target affected by your Corruption also has their movement speed slowed by 15%.

legendaries.name: Malefic Wrath
legendaries.description:
Malefic Rapture increases the damage of your 

<condition>Drain Soul</condition>
<dynamic>Drain Soul</dynamic>

Shadow Bolt by 25% for 8 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

legendaries.name: Wrath of Consumption
legendaries.description: Targets with die with your Agony applied to them grant you Wrath of Consumption, increasing all periodic damage dealt by 5% for 20 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

legendaries.name: Implosive Pontential
legendaries.description: When Implosion damages at least 3 targets, gain 5% Haste for 8 sec for each Imp exploded.

legendaries.name: Grim Inquisitor's Dread Calling
legendaries.description: Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by 3%.

legendaries.name: Forces of the Horned Nightmare
legendaries.description: Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to cast a second time on your target for free.

legendaries.name: Balespider's Burning Core
legendaries.description: Shadow Bolt increases the damage of your next Demonbolt by 25%, stacking up to 4 times.

legendaries.name: Odr, Shawl of the Ymirjar
legendaries.description: Enemies marked by your Havoc take 15% increased damage from your single target spells.

legendaries.name: Cinders of the Azj'Aqir
legendaries.description: Conflagrate has 1 additional charge and has its recharge time reduced by 3.0 sec.

legendaries.name: Madness of the Azj'Aqir
legendaries.description: Chaos Bolt increases the damage of Chaos Bolt by 10% and reduces the cast time of Chaos Bolt by 10% for 3 sec.

legendaries.name: Embers of the Diabolic Raiment
legendaries.description: Incinerate now generates 100% additional Soul Shard Fragments.
